title: J.VER Men's Silk Satin Long Sleeve Dress Shirts Shiny Casual Button Down Shirt Luxury Party Prom Shirts
description: Fabric: The mens dress shirts are made of silk-like satin fabric, smooth and soft, comfortable and breathable to wear
Style and Design: Men's button down shirt, spread collar, Long sleeves. The luxury shiny silk shirt reflects the understated elegance of our shirts with a strong sense of individuality
Occasion: Suitable for Party, festival, prom, wedding, daily wear, banquet, business etc. Perfect gift for families, friends or boyfriend

Size: Our dress shirts are US regular fit tailoring style, a variety of sizes and colors for you to choose, please refer to the size chart to choose the size that suits you. It can be hand wash or machine wash cold
Washing Method: 1. It is recommended to hand wash or machine wash in cold water to protect the fabric's texture and color. 2. Normal dry Cleaning
